There is a measuring ruler on top which would be great for fishing as well as a bottle opener. This cooler also features a really strong handle.

review_header: Kept ice from melting - great cooler
review_content: Great cooler - kept our ice from melting for over a day. It did not leak - which is key when you're car camping!

My boyfriend and I purchased this cooler and a larger one for day trips and to use on the boat. We consider these coolers as investment pieces and were okay to spend more for them. The cooler has nice features and keeps things cold. The inside of the cooler is smaller than you think because the walls of the cooler are pretty thick. If you want to make sure a certain amount of items can fit into the cooler, be sure to check the product specs for the inside dimensions. Great product.

Keeps my drinks cold even After three 90 degree days! Love the look and the sturdiness. Weight wise, its not too heavy once full either. The cup holders and the ruler on top are nice features as well.

review_header: Perfect lunch cooler for the truck
review_content: Throw this lunch cooler in the truck and its like your own refrigerator. It stays cool for days!
Pay attention to the dimensions as the exterior is quite a bit larger than the interior. But the cooler works very well. The weight is good not too heavy and very balanced

Our Igloo seems to be a nice cooler. I was surprised at how much it doesn't hold. We have definitely had to rearrange and reduce the amount of items we pack. I do wish the rubber pieces were not on the bottom. They drag and won't allow the cooler to slide. It holds ice fairly well.
This igloo is built very sturdy. And with normal use staying in the heat. Ive had ice last up to 3 days. I plan on getting the larger model next. 10/10

review_header: Great cooler, love the basket too!
review_content: This cooler is great! It holds ice for days even in the back of my truck in 90+ weather! Its a good size and the handle seems strong, sturdy. I like the rubber feet and the little legs it has that keeps the bottom off the ground/ truck bed. Im very happy with this purchase! It looks just like the picture and the description was accurate.
This cooler is amazing. Holds ice for days, easy to use and we love the look!
Very pleased! This cooler looks great, performs well and is  of the price of the popular brand, love it!
A little beefy. Come on IglooYall been doing this for a long time, right? Good for by the pool, keeps ice as advertised. Way to heavy for the kayak, small inside.
A bit larger on the outside and smaller inside than I expected, but not unreasonably so. I feel like it's a good value and comparable to the high-dollar coolers.
Same size as other, more expensive, coolers but much less expensive and works wonderfully!

love this cooler! exactly what i was looking for to keep in the back of my jeep for summertime. keeps things cold 4-5 days, comes with a little basket that ive been putting like limes in. design is nice and sleek and the quality of it is amazing. exactly what i was looking for, love all the features.

This cooler is just as expected. Durable, and the perfect size for a road trip. Its less expensive than a Yeti, and also has more features than Yeti (bottle opener), etc. Looking forward to getting great use out of it!
This things external dimensions are huge. If your trying to get a smaller cooler this isnt the one. On the upside its really well made, holds ice for a long time and can double as a table.
Great cooler, really didnt know how large it was till it came in. Is a little bigger than expected but definitely worth the money

review_header: Amazing Purchase! Get it before they're gone!
review_content: Super glad I got it when I did. Referred a few friends to it and fully gained their interest when they seen it. They went to purchase one on their own and seen that the tan sets were sold out. Id highly suggest anyone looking at these to get it now. They come with a 5 year warranty so if anything does happen, which I highly doubt because they're built like a tank, you're covered.
It is a really good cooler that I am glad I purchased.
Solid cooler. Tight seal on the lid. Durable. Cup holders and ruler are a nice touch.
Great product! Drain leaks a bit but my boyfriend wont let it out of his sight. So no fixing i guess lol
Perfect size! The bottle opener was a nice touch. Would definitely recommend.
Awesome cooler!! Holds ice for days and the basket is great for holding sandwiches
Quality cooler at a great price. Looks awesome, too. Ice holds in the Florida heat for up to 5 days.

I really really like it. I used it Saturday one bag of ice and it is monday still has ice. I got it to take in the trunk of my car but it was to big and kind of heavy so I will have to buy something smaller but not disappointed at all with my purchase.
Love this cooler! Took it on the boat and it preformed beautifully. Also like the domed lid on the inside and the basket!
Love my new cooler hope it lasts as long as they say it will
I've only had this a few weeks, but the times I've used it, it holds up well, and is easy to carry. Kudos, great product.
This is an awesome cooler! Great feel and very durable. I got a little bit less than the suggest time for how long it held ice but it was still amazing.
Great cooler, intead of buying ice everyday, now a bag lasts 3 days.
Keeps ice pretty fair. But very nice its lighter than others
It is a nice well equipped cooler with a lot of insulation so the ice does last a lot longer
This cooler is everything I expected and more! It is very easy to move around even when full and keeps ice for days with no problem.
Nice cooler but heavy and lacking tie down strap holes to keep secure.

This is one neat cooler and imo, much "cooler" than some other really expensive coolers. It's pretty large but really well made and absolutely a great design! Only gripe is that the actual cooler interior is small for its overall size. Awesome product, Igloo. Glad to see you come out with something as the iconic cooler mfg to challenge the newer, crazy expensive new cooler on the block (can you say "rhymes with Getty?").
Absolutely love this cooler, it's perfect for the boat keeps drinks cold , and holds ice for days in the Georgia sun , my friends that own the other brands like my igloo better.

I bought this cooler with the expectations of it being a little bigger inside. It holds the ice well on a hot day here in Florida. The handle is pretty strong and it does have a little weight to it. Im satisfied and it serves its purpose!
I just got back from a four day fishing trip. This cooler still had half of the ice remaining after using it for a bait cooler.
I got it for my wife and she loves it. I have the IMX 70 Qt. And I love it too
Great cooler!!! Looks great and performs even better. Best part is, it will keep ice for a couple days, even after long days on the water fishing.
This Igloo cooler at a fraction of the price of a Yeti delivers the same performance and comes with a basket at no additional charge!
Great product and price point, bought this for my ATVing excursions and it has proved to be tough as nails Keep up the with the great coolers

Wanted a smaller lighter cooler to hold mostly beer or soft drinks! I use it when traveling in our RV or boat. No chance of grizzly bears busting into it, wanted to be able to lift in and out of trailer and boat without pulling a muscle! Get price, lighter weight, good build quality. So far very happy. I would by this again.
Compared to the premium brands (Yeti, etc.) this cooler is an excellent value. Great design and construction. Dry basket is included. This thing should last a lifetime.

review_header: IMX 24 - Great , but not enough of it
review_content: I own both the 70 and 24 qt IMX coolers, the big one was a gift from my very thoughtful and resourceful daughter, who thought "Dad can use this and when he cant , I can:) I bought the 24 hoping it wouldn't be too small, but sadly, for two people on a drift boat on a summer day it is. Sure it holds ice pretty much like its big brother , and yes the lid is secure in transit both on water and in the back of the rig but the size, well it doesn't measure up. Not big enough to keep iced down water bottles for two ( reusable ones) a couple beers or sodas and your perishable lunch fixings ( we stored the apples and unopened summer sausage in the dry goods bin) Love the coolers function, durability and looks but really, truly we need 12 more quarts
Great cooler! As good as its competitors, but at a much lower cost!
This has been a great cooler for day trips on the river.
Great Size, sturdy, keeps ice/drinks cold for several days. We would purchase again. This cooler is heavier than one would think.
I love this cooler! It gets the job done and its small enough to take anywhere.
Nice cooler for the price, keeps my goodies nice and cold for days

I purchased this cooler thinking if it didnt hold ice well or feel like a solid cooler Id just spend the extra money to get a YETI! We used this thing the entire summer last year and had no issues. Even on the lake with hot summer weather and my kids going in and out of it. Plenty of ice still at the end of the day. Its not a massive cooler but for some drinks and snacks it serves its purpose extremely well especially considering the price. Everyone that looks at it and touches it is very impressed with the quality. Its a super nice cooler.
This cooler works amazing! Only downfall is its a little bulky compared to others like it. But cant complain for the price.

Ill put this cooler up against any of those high dollar coolers out there. Im a big man (300lbs) and I can stand on it. It keeps ice for several days. Best of all it is a fraction of the price compared to the others on the market. I love mine.
It's a great cooler. Will keep things cold for days. I will say is bigger than I imagined. Much bigger But it works perfect.
